actionExpired: You can only message a couple within 72 hours of them interacting with your venue.
dataUpdateInfo: The data in this dashboard updates hourly.
disclaimer_message: Please note that your message will be sent as an email from Bridebook. If a couple is interested, they will send you an enquiry.
errorMessageAlert: Something has gone wrong... Have you already messaged this couple?
form.exampleMessage: <0>"Hi Emily and Matt, congratulations on your engagement!</0><1></1>We’d love to tell you more about why getting married at our venue is so special and answer any questions you might have about your big day. Simply "Request a brochure" on our profile to find out more and we'll get in touch!"
form.sendMessageDescription: Use the box below to convince this couple to enquire and consider your venue as the one for their big day!
form.supplier.exampleMessage: <0>"Hi Emily and Matt, congratulations on your engagement!</0><1></1>We’d love to tell you more about why we can make your day so special and answer any questions you might have. Simply "Request a brochure" on our profile to find out more and we’ll get in touch!"
form.supplier.sendMessageDescription: Use the box below to convince this couple to enquire and consider your business as the one to use for their big day.
listElement.customOffers: Send them a custom offer "Free bottle of champagne for you and your partner if you come visit".
listElement.exampleMessage: An example of a previously sent message:
listElement.feelSpecial: Make them feel special "We think you would be an excellent fit for our venue".
listElement.informShowround: Inform them of upcoming showrounds at your venue.
listElement.shareLink: Share a link with photos from previous real weddings to inspire them.
listElement.supplier.customOffers: Send them a custom offer "10% off if you book this month".
listElement.supplier.feelSpecial: Make them feel special "I think we would be an excellent fit for each other".
listElement.supplier.informShowround: Inform them of upcoming showrounds you will be attending.
listElement.supplier.shareLink: Share a link with photos from previous real weddings to inspire them.
noCouplesMessagesLeft: You have reached your weekly limit. It will renew every Sunday.
profileInteractionRequired: This couple needs to interact with your profile before you can message them.
promoSubtitle: Get visibility on how couples engage with your profile, then reach out to any couples you are interested in working with.
well.description: With {{tierName}} you have unlocked the unique possibility to proactively message couples who have not enquired with you. Choose your favourite couple and click "Send message to couple".
well.title: Power Match
